div.ab:
When you make flesh colors, it is good to have a
cristallin
mirror
, which represents nature well, and in which
it
you will see if your shadows are soft enough or too crude. But do not look at it with a
candle
, for
firelight
will make the shadows reddish. The
painter
also teaches himself with the
mirror
, for he sees in it what nature can do.
